top-page.title: Streamline the Online Application Process
top-page.desc: Stop filling out countless rental applications and make the system work for you instead. Fill out a single application and save it to your profile. Then you can instantly apply to your favorite rentals for free.

text.desc: Don't let those application fees pile up. Pay a single fee, then share your profile with any landlord whose property rentals you're interested in.

text-start.title: Verified Identity
text-start.text: We make sure that you are who you say you are, so landlords have a sense of trust toward you right from the start.

text-center.title: Credit Check
text-center.text: You're more than just a credit score, which is why we provide detailed financial histories to landlords, so they can get a whole view with your tenant application form.

text-end.title: Rental History
text-end.text: You won't have to recount past addresses and landlords over and over again with Rentorr- simply do it once, then you're good to go.

title-one.title: Why Is Rentorr Tenant Screen The Best?

item.title: It Won't Impact Your Credit
item.text: Since the screening is initiated by you, it counts as only a soft inquiry, which won't negatively impact your credit score.

item.title: You Get The Information Too
item.text: Once your screening is complete, you can log in to view a copy of the credit report that Rentorr generated.

item.title: Control Over Privacy
item.text: You have the final say in terms of who gets to see your information, and you can also revoke access anytime you'd like.

item.title: Less Wait Time
item.text: Since the entire process is handled digitally, you don't have to wait for paperwork to process. Instead, you'll be able to apply faster, and therefore move into your new rental faster.

img-desc.title: High Quality Security Keeps You Protected
img-desc.text: We understand that it can be nerve-wracking handing out your personal information, and that's why Rentorr uses the same encryption method as all banks to protect your information from security breaches. We also work with Compuscan to ensure the credit information we collect is accurate.

ready.title: Ready to Use Rentorr?
ready.desc: You won't believe how simple it is to apply to the rentals of your dreams with Rentorr-get started today to see for yourself.
